S

SaveCommand - Class in commands
SaveCommand is an executor class which saves the image file currently being edited to the project's root directory.
SaveCommand(ResourceBundle, Resources) - Constructor for class commands.SaveCommand
Initialises the pre-requisite resources for the command execution.
ScriptCommand - Class in commands
ScriptCommand is an executor class which opens and executes a script text file that contains a series of commands.
ScriptCommand(ResourceBundle, Resources) - Constructor for class commands.ScriptCommand
Initialises the pre-requisite resources for the command execution.
setCurrentImageHistory(Stack<ColorImage>) - Method in class src.Resources
Sets the ColorImage Stack to the provided parameter.
setFinished(boolean) - Method in class src.Resources
Sets the 'finished' field with the value given in the parameter.
setName(String) - Method in class src.Resources
Sets the name of the current loaded image
setPixel(int, int, Color) - Method in class src.ColorImage
Set a given pixel of this image to a specified color.
setSecondWord(String) - Method in class commands.Command
Sets the secondWord field with the second word given by the user.
setThirdWord(String) - Method in class commands.Command
Sets the thirdWord field with the third word given by the user.
src - package src
The src package contains the main source files that constitutes the application body and links the interface with the operations.
